articles.title: Henry Kissinger, US' Controversial Ex Secretary Of State, Turns 100 - NDTV
articles.description: Henry Kissinger, whose very name is synonymous with US diplomacy, turns 100 Saturday feted by the American elite as others seethe that the ruthless Cold Warrior has never faced accountability.
articles.content:
Kissinger was controversially co-awarded the Nobel Peace Prize. (File)
Washington: Henry Kissinger, whose very name is synonymous with US diplomacy, turns 100 Saturday feted by the American elite as… [+5245 chars]

articles.author: Karen Weintraub
articles.title: Long COVID symptoms finally identified: What this means for treatment - USA TODAY
articles.description: Researchers can finally identify the symptoms of long COVID thanks to a study of 10,000 Americans. Here's what that means for treatment.
articles.content: A clearer picture of what's become known as long COVID-19 is starting to emerge, which should eventually allow researchers to treat symptoms that can devastate people's lives for months or years afte… [+7399 chars]
